linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Ventura
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i7 7660U 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p 60FPS

name: Final Outpost: Definitive Edition Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 720p 30FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p 60FPS

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
